name: Robo-Showdown!
description:
Note: If you are not able to fire in the next levels, do not fire when the boss is already at zero health, this will be patched post-jam.

This game is a top-down permadeath boss battler.

Shoot and avoid opposing robots to win the annual Robo-Showdown tournament!

Let me know your times if you beat the game!

Instructions:

WASD to move
K or Space to shoot in the direction the ship is facing
Enter Key to select in powerup selection screen
R to Restart from the beginning

Hint: Watch each boss carefully as they all have set defined movements.

Made in two weeks for LOWREZJAM 2022. Music/sound effects, art and gameplay created by me.
